translation.en: [man over radio] Incident Command, this is Redding Five
approaching a timber fire off Route 16.
translation.ko: 16번 도로 인근 산불 현장에 접근하고 있다

translation.en: We've got a high rate of spread on this one,
with a line of cars that are blocking emergency vehicles,
translation.ko: 차들이 응급 차량의 진입을 막고 있다

translation.en: so we're gonna send in the jumpers on the left flank.
Approaching drop zone now.
[man 1] Honey, it's really bad. I don't know when…
We're trapped. We can't get out.
-What do we do now? -We need a miracle.
-[woman 1] Where? Oh! -[woman 2] Look!
-Where's my Redding Crew at? -[crew members] Everywhere!
translation.ko: 레딩 대원들은 어디 있지? 모든 곳에!

translation.en: Road's backed up for miles and we need to get emergency teams in here.
translation.ko: 도로가 꽉 막혔어 응급팀을 이리 데려와야 해

translation.en: But right now our job is to keep that fire from those vehicles.
translation.ko: 하지만 우선은 불이 차량에 번지지 않게 해

translation.en: Alpha Team, cut a line upslope and prep for a burn.
translation.ko: 알파팀은 화재 저지선 만들고 불태울 준비해

translation.en: [crew members] Yes, sir!
Beta Team, stay close to me.
[Mark] Love being close to you, Supe.
In the words of Stormin' Norman Schwarzkopf,
translation.ko: '사막의 폭풍 작전'을 지휘한 노먼 슈워츠코프가 그랬죠

translation.en: "If you can't take the heat, get out the kitchen!"
translation.ko: '열기를 참을 수 없다면 부엌에서 당장 나와라!'

translation.en: Not even close.
Let's disagree to agree, 'cause quotes are my thing.
translation.ko: 생각이야 다를 수 있지 인용은 내 전문이거든

translation.en: Fire's gonna do a 180 off the line!
Supe! Laser!
[crew member 2] Alpha Team! Move! Move!
It's getting real warm down here. Got me?
-[man over radio] Roger that. -Two… one…
Paint it pink!
Whoo! I love the smell… [laughing] …of Phos-Chek in the morning!
translation.ko: 난 아침에 방화제 냄새 맡는 게 좋더라!

translation.en: -Whoa! [gags, coughs] -Huh? Whoa, whoa, you okay?
I'm good. I'm good.
-Thank you for sav-- [grunts] -[car alarm blaring]
You are the bravest man I've ever seen.
-And the hottest. -Thank you, ma'am. But for us,
-it's just another day at the office. -[helicopter whirring]
My husband sells insurance! Take me with you!
translation.ko: 제 남편은 보험 팔아요! 절 데려가 줘요!

translation.en: I'm literally standing right here.
-[music continues] -[all chattering, cheering]
Hey, hey, hey, guys!
My dawgs, come on, come on.
You crushed it out there, men. You crushed it!
Hey, I am so sorry, Supe.
The guys were just blowing off steam. I apologize.
There will be time for steam reallocation later.
Our main priority is to get this depot tip-top.
translation.ko: 우리의 주목적은 이 지구대를 결점 없게 운영하는 거다

translation.en: Gentlemen, you know how quickly things can go sideways.
translation.ko: 제군들은 상황이 얼마나 빨리 악화하는지 잘 알고 있다

translation.en: Heck, my dad was the greatest smokejumper ever to hang boots in this depot.
translation.ko: 젠장, 우리 아버지는 이 지구대 최고의 삼림 소방대원이셨어

translation.en: [man] Mm, I don't know.
[Mark] Now I got it. It's a bit sliver!
[exhales sharply, groaning] That is-- that is in there.
Gentlemen, we must be at our very best…
-Every second of every day! -Every second of every day!
translation.ko: - 매일 매 순간! - 매일 매 순간!

translation.en: Exactly. Now, where's my Redding Crew at?
-Everywhere! -Everywhere!
-[reporter] Commander Richards. -[Commander Richards] Mm.
The way you and your men put out that fire today,
it felt like it was really the work of superheroes.
translation.ko: 정말 슈퍼히어로들이 작업하는 것 같았어요 "채널 10 뉴스 속보"

translation.en: "Superheroes"?
That's the Santa Barbara fire!
[Commander Richards] No. We're just men with a lot a training,
translation.ko: 아뇨, 우린 그저 열심히 훈련한 보통 사람들입니다

translation.en: very strict exercise regimens, and first-class genetics.
translation.ko: 엄격한 훈련을 받고 유전적으로 월등한 보통 사람요 "샌타바버라 화재 진압 섀나 하이엇 기자"

translation.en: Now that I say it out loud, I guess we are superheroes.
translation.ko: 이렇게 얘기하고 보니 슈퍼히어로가 맞는 것 같네요

translation.en: [reporter] After a storied career as Division Commander,
rumor has it you're considering retirement.
-Care to comment? -The rumors are true.
You should be the next Division Commander. You've been training for this
translation.ko: 대장이 본부장이 되어야죠 레고로 소방대원 놀이할 때부터

translation.en: since you were saving LEGO people from LEGO fires.
It's what my dad and I always dreamed of.
[Commander Richards] …the ability to put a fire out.
[reporter] Commander Richards, are you afraid of anything?
-Uh, Supe? -No, I'm not afraid of anything.
Except for mice. They're a little creepy.
-Supe. -What?
Sorry, Supe. We're gonna join the Santa Barbara crew.
-We just want to be in the big leagues. -[scoffs] What--
translation.ko: 큰물에서 놀고 싶어요 무슨… 여기가 큰물이야!

translation.en: You are so in the big leagues!
Were you not in that fire? I just singed my eyebrows!
translation.ko: 너희도 그 불 진압했잖아 난 눈썹도 그슬렸다고!

translation.en: Smell my beard, it smells like a luau.
That was disturbing.
-Axe, you coming with us? -[Axe growls]
[Rodrigo] Ha! Ha! Go! Go! Go! Go, get out of here! Get out of here, you backstabbers.
If you had a fraternity, I wouldn't even join it!
translation.ko: 너희한테 형제애라는 게 있다 해도 난 너희랑 안 어울려!

translation.en: Can you even step?
Huh? We don't need you!
[shouts] We don't need you!
We need them. We need them, Chief. We just lost
three of our best jumpers and our pilot. Come on, man. What's the backup plan?
translation.ko: 방금 대원 3명과 헬기 조종사가 떠났어요 대안이 있나요?

translation.en: -We're gonna do what we always do. -[Mark] Tidy up the depot?
We stay vigilant. Rely on our training.
translation.ko: 경계를 늦추지 말고 훈련한 대로 해

translation.en: Although, that's gonna mean that, uh…
I'm gonna have to fly. [breathing heavily]
I don't know if I'm ready for that, I mean--
translation.ko: 전 준비가 안 된 것 같은데…

translation.en: I… I… I mean, I was much more comfortable
being the backup pilot. I'm… I'm really not suited
translation.ko: 전 예비 조종사가 더 편해요 앞에 나서는 건 체질에 안 맞거든요

translation.en: for a leadership role, right at this moment.
translation.ko: 앞에 나서는 건 체질에 안 맞거든요

translation.en: -Congratulations. You've been called up. -[siren blaring]
[Rodrigo] But, Sup-- Oh, man.
Fire down by the lake.
-[alarm stops] -[pants] Relax, guys. Relax.
They don't even need us.
Local team says there's this massive storm coming here,
and it's just gonna-- Let it burn out.
translation.ko: 그냥 타게 놔둬도 알아서 꺼질 테니 편히 있어요

translation.en: [chuckles] So there's no need to be nervous, or just relax, stay cool.
translation.ko: 그냥 타게 놔둬도 알아서 꺼질 테니 편히 있어요 그냥 편히 있으라고요

translation.en: Lieutenant, there's cabins down by that lake.
I'm looking for the best of the best.
translation.ko: 전 최고 중의 최고를 찾고 있어요

translation.en: Someone who knows what a fire's gonna do before it does it.
translation.ko: 화재의 심각성을 누구보다 잘 아는 사람을요

translation.en: If you're worried about it, we could just go down there
and check it out, right?
Whoever takes over the position is going to be almost as great as me.
translation.ko: 누가 제 자리를 맡든 저만큼 능력을 갖춰야 할 겁니다

translation.en: We need eyes on the ground.
-Call Dr. Hicks! -Call Dr. Hicks!
Didn't you guys go on a few dates?
-[Skype call ringing] -Dates? No.
There were two or three occurrences where we sat together for chow.
translation.ko: 같이 두세 번 밥 먹은 것뿐이야

translation.en: -Oh, so, dates. -We're-- we're professionals.
I decided that, uh… -[Mark] Supe… -…our spending time together
-was taking me away from this. -Supe…
-So I chose to press pause. -In the middle of our date?
Dr. Hicks! [clears throat]
What's the problem, Superintendent Carson?
Why do you assume there's a problem?
Unless you're calling three months later to apologize
for going to the bathroom during our dinner
translation.ko: 다시 안 돌아온 걸 3개월 후에 사과하려고

translation.en: -and never coming back. -Oh, no, she didn't.
translation.ko: 전화한 건 아닐 테니까요 콕콕 찌르네

translation.en: -I am sorry. I will go over here. -[toads croaking]
Okay, there's a problem.
I need you to bring up your cameras. There's a fire down by the lake.
translation.ko: 당신 카메라가 필요해요 호수 옆에 화재가 발생했어요

translation.en: There. Zoom in on that cabin. Right there.
translation.ko: 거기, 저 오두막을 확대해봐요 바로 거기요

translation.en: Oh, no. Oh, I see it. I see that the--
With a storm coming in, there is no way the local depot is gonna make it.
translation.ko: 폭풍우 때문에 현지 지구대는 저기까지 못 가

translation.en: -Get the chopper ready. -[sighs]
-Where's my Redding Crew at? -Everywhere!
translation.ko: - 레딩 대원들은 어디 있지? - 모든 곳에!

translation.en: -[Axe growls] -[shudders] Everywhere. Chopper flies in five.
[Mark] Oh, look, we're off the ground. So far, so good.
All right. Deploying the Bambi, now.
Carson!
[Rodrigo] All right, heads up, guys. Confirming fire structure.
Three thousand pounds of water coming at you.
Dropping the water… now!
Okay, uh, nice try.
Can you try being a little more supportive?
I haven't flown in a while, okay?
Supe, you want me to double back to the lake?
translation.ko: 대장, 다시 호수로 가서 물 담을까요?

translation.en: No, ditch the bucket. Give me a line.
-[Jake] Good? -You're good.
Hold her steady!
You're on, you're ten feet from there.
Proceeding with room check.
Clear!
-[Bunny] I love you. -[girl 1 coughing]
-[girl 1] Bunny! -[girl 2] I will get you another one.
-[girl 1] Bunny. -[girl 2] Zoey…
I got three civilians in the bravo side of the structure.
-You hurt? -Are you really a fireman?
I'm-- I'm a smokejumper, which is like a firefighter,
translation.ko: 삼림 소방대원이야 소방관 비슷한데 더 멋있지

translation.en: -but way cooler. -What does a smokejumper do?
translation.ko: - 무슨 일 하는데요? - 공중 낙하해서 화재를 진압하지

translation.en: -We jump into fires to fight them. -Firemen fight fires.
translation.ko: - 무슨 일 하는데요? - 공중 낙하해서 화재를 진압하지 소방관이 불 끄잖아요

translation.en: Yeah, but there's over a million firefighters,
-there's only 336 smokejumpers. -A million's more than 300.
translation.ko: - 우린 336명뿐이야 - 백만 명이 더 많은 거잖아요

translation.en: In this case, less is more. Listen, stop! I don't have time.
translation.ko: 이런 건 적은 게 더 좋은 거야 그만! 시간 없어

translation.en: -Where are your parents? -They're not here.
I-- I can't get a hold of them.
Okay, fine. I'm getting you out, one by one.
-You first. Let's go. -Uh… Take Will first.
translation.ko: - 너 먼저 가자 - 윌부터 데리고 가요

translation.en: -No. Take Zoey, then Brynn, then me. -No. Zoey, then you, then me.
translation.ko: - 아뇨, 조이, 누나, 난 마지막요 - 아니, 조이, 너, 내가 마지막

translation.en: No. No, we do what I say and we do it now!
translation.ko: 안 돼, 내 말대로 해 나가야 해, 당장!

translation.en: Copy that. We're a go for extraction.
No. Wait. Wait! [grunts]
Stop! [grunts]
-[grunting] Wait! -The button, it's jammed.
Stop! [grunting, screaming]
This must be why there are so few smokejumpers.
translation.ko: 삼림 소방대원 수가 적은 이유를 알겠다

translation.en: All right. Let's try this again. Come on, come on, come on.
-[Will] Oh, no! -[Jake] Whoa!
Okay, I'm gonna clip us all together, and we all go at once. Okay?
Bunny!
Go now!
-"Now," now? -Yes, he said now!
[Rodrigo] Well, he said "now" before! What if he changes his mind again?
translation.ko: 아까도 '지금'이라고 했어! 또 마음이 바뀌면 어쩌려고?

translation.en: -[Mark] He's not gonna change his mind! -Hey, guys, focus! Now!
translation.ko: - 이번엔 확실해! - 대원들, 집중해! 지금 올려!

translation.en: It's the Channel Six news team!
[male reporter] Folks, we are witnessing a live aerial rescue.
translation.ko: 여러분은 지금 공중 구출 현장을 생방송으로 보고 계십니다

translation.en: Take the children to St. Stephen's for medical eval.
-Copy that. -[Brynn] But why? We're fine.
Protocol.
Hey, Supe. Storm's on top of us. Winds are at 20 knots.
translation.ko: 대장, 폭풍이 우릴 덮쳤어요 바람이 시속 37km로 불어요

translation.en: -I… I… I need to set down, now! -[thunder rumbling]
Fine. Head back to the depot. We'll evaluate 'em there.
What the heck are three eight-year-olds doing alone
translation.ko: 8살짜리 애들 셋이 그런 외딴곳에서 뭐 하고 있었던 거지?

translation.en: -in the middle of nowhere? -Eight? I'm not eight.
translation.ko: 8살짜리 애들 셋이 그런 외딴곳에서 뭐 하고 있었던 거지? 8살요? 난 8살 아니에요

translation.en: Hey! If he says you're eight, you're eight.
Where's the pole? Can I slide down the pole?
translation.ko: 봉은 어디 있어요? 그거 타봐도 돼요?

translation.en: -Depot's one floor. No pole. -Do you have a hook and ladder?
translation.ko: - 여긴 1층 건물이라 봉 없어 - 사다리 소방차는요?

translation.en: Hook and ladder? No.
What kind of firefighter are you?
[Jake] I told you.
I'm a smokejumper, which, again, is way better.
translation.ko: 삼림 소방대원이라고 일반 소방관보다 훨씬 좋아

translation.en: Where are your parents?
[Brynn] They went up the coast for a night for their 20th anniversary.
And I'm extremely responsible.
I've kept these two out of trouble their entire lives.
-Hey! -Whoo!
Yeah, I can see that.
Put that down.
No shenanigans on my watch!
translation.ko: 내가 있는 한 장난은 안 돼!

translation.en: Yeah, no monkeyshines, tomfoolery, or hijinks.
translation.ko: 그럼요, 개구쟁이 짓, 멍청한 놀이 야단법석, 안 되죠

translation.en: You finished?
As long as there's not a hint of malarkey.
Whoa! Now, if I didn't know any better,
I would say that that was sarcasm.
translation.ko: 그 말이 비꼬는 건 줄도 몰랐을 거야

translation.en: So why don't we just take it down a notch, sister, okay?
translation.ko: 살살 좀 하는 게 어때, 아가씨?

translation.en: Maybe a little gratitude would be helpful.
Sorry, bud, we just don't speak oldsey-timesy.
translation.ko: 죄송한데요, 아저씨 우린 구닥다리처럼은 안 해서…

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. Oh, but she's not stopping.
translation.ko: 이런, 맙소사 그만할 생각을 안 하네

translation.en: It's just-- That's just sarcasm, right? It's that-- I mean, that's not just me, right?
translation.ko: 계속 비꼬는 거지? 나만 그렇게 생각하는 거 아니지?

translation.en: -It's just sarcasm. -No, it's not just you. I just--
translation.ko: - 비꼬는 거야 - 너만 그런 거 아니야

translation.en: -I-- I felt it now, little miss. -[Mark] Wow!
Gentlemen… I got this.
My name isn't "bud" or "man" or "dude."
It is Superintendent Jake Carson.
But you can call me that. The whole thing.
This is Captain Mark Rogers, Lieutenant Rodrigo Torres,
translation.ko: 여긴 마크 로저스 소방위고 로드리고 토레스 소방장

translation.en: -and that is Axe. -[chuckles]
-Hi, Axe. -[growls]
Does he always carry that axe?
Yeah, 'cause he's always ready to roll.
translation.ko: 응, 언제든 출동 준비가 돼 있지

translation.en: -[laughs] -All right, all right. What's your mom's number?
You can't just cold call my mom. What do you think she's gonna do
translation.ko: 엄마한테 그냥 알리면 안 돼요 소방서에서 전화 와서 오두막이 다 탄 걸 알면

translation.en: when she sees the caller ID from a fire station
translation.ko: 소방서에서 전화 와서 오두막이 다 탄 걸 알면

translation.en: and finds out her cabin burned down?
-I'll call her. -[Jake] Fine.
and you hand it right over to me.
It's straight to voicemail.
Hey, Mom, please don't worry. We're all totally fine.
translation.ko: 엄마, 걱정하지 마세요 우린 전부 괜찮은데…

translation.en: But I'm so sorry to tell you that the cabin burned down.
We were rescued by these smokejumpers,
which I've heard are actually way cooler than firemen.
Apparently, there's only 339 of them in the entire country.
Three hundred thirty-six. And-- and this, when you do that,
that's not helpful.
So, we couldn't be in safer hands.
-I guess you can take your time. -No! No, no. [laughing]
translation.ko: 두 분이 즐겁게 시간 보내세요 아니지!

translation.en: Hello, ma'am. Uh… Hello, ma'am.
-Hello, ma'am? -It's still a voicemail.
This is Superintendent Jake Carson of Redding Depot, Region Five.
translation.ko: 제5 구역 레딩 지구대의 제이크 카슨 대장입니다

translation.en: I have your children.
They are physically unharmed, but I must say
they are a bit of a handful.
Please call me back ASAP to make arrangements to come pick them up.
Thank you.
-Have a-- have a great rest of the day. -[keypad beeps]
That doesn't make any sense, unless-- Oh, yeah.
translation.ko: 그건 말도 안 돼, 하지만… 아, 그렇지…

translation.en: Lieutenant, how bad's the storm?
Well, in the words of Mahatma Gandhi,
"It's bad. Real, real bad."
Nope. Not even one thing about that was right.
[chuckles] Why you got to go and blow up my spot like that?
translation.ko: 넌 왜 내 농담에 찬물을 끼얹는 거야? 나라면…

translation.en: Can we make it to the police station?
Chief, it's 90 miles. The roads are all flooded.
translation.ko: 대장, 145km 떨어진 데다 도로가 물에 잠겼다고요

translation.en: You don't want to take the kids out in that.
What about the Safe Haven Law?
As first responders, we're legally bound for the health and welfare of the children
translation.ko: 응급 구조원으로서 애들 법적 보호자가 나타날 때까지

translation.en: until they're relinquished to a legal guardian.
translation.ko: 우린 애들을 돌봐야 하는 법적 책임이 있어요

translation.en: Of course. I know what the Safe Haven Law is.
translation.ko: 당연하지 나도 그 피난처 규정은 알아

translation.en: Well, see? See, it's-- it's a good thing the Alpha Team quit
translation.ko: 봤죠? 알파팀이 그만둔 건 잘된 거라니까요

translation.en: 'cause now we got all this spare room for the kids to sleep in. Huh?
translation.ko: 침대가 많이 비니까 애들이 잘 수 있잖아요

translation.en: -[Rodrigo chuckles] -[chuckles] Yeah. Lucky us.
Let's do this.
Hey, guys! Do you know that the hose can reach--
Attention, everyone-- [grunts]
-Man down. I'm coming, Supe! -[Rodrigo] Whoa!
translation.ko: 대원이 쓰러졌다 내가 가고 있어요, 대장!

translation.en: This depot is not a playground!
"Got your message. Thank you." [chuckles]
"There is really spotty service here. We're…
stuck due to the storm but we will set out first thing in the morning."
translation.ko: '폭풍에 갇혀서 지금은 꼼짝도 못 하지만' '내일 아침 일찍 그리로 출발할게요'
